TEXT.FORM: kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe iʑora iɕqha, ɬasa tu-ti-nɯ tɕe, ɬasa tɕe iʑo ɣɯ iɕqha, nɤki, kɯrɯ tɕhoz nɯ wuma ʑo kɯ-tar, tɕe nɯnɯ sɤtɕha kɯnɤ kɯ-sɤtatpa, χpɯn nɯra kɯnɤ kɯ-sɤtatpa tɕe, (010) tɯrme nɯra kɯ-cha, ɬasa kɤ-ʑɣɤsɤzɣɯt kɯ-cha nɯ, wuma ʑo kɯ-pe tu-nɯ-rtsi-nɯ tɕe, tɕe nɯ-kɯ-si kɯnɤ mɤ-kɤ-ʁdɯɣ kɯ-fse. ma nɯmaʁnɤ kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe nɯ-kɯ-si tɕe kɯ-nɯʁɲɤlwa ra, tɕe nɤki χɕɯnrʑi ɯ-ɕki kɤ-kɯ-zɣɯt tɕe, (020) wuma ʑo kɯ-sɤzdɯxpa tɕe kɯ-zdɯɣ kɯ-sŋɤl ra" nɯra tu-ti-nɯ. tɕe nɯra ntsɯ pjɯ-fɕɤt-nɯ pɯ-ŋu tɕe, tɕe tɯrme kɯ-cha nɯnɯra tɕe tɕendɤre, nɯ-mgo tu-nɯ-fkur-nɯ, nɯ-ŋga tu-nɯ-fkur-nɯ tɕe tɕendɤre, kɤ-ŋke ɬasa tu-ɕe-nɯ. (040) tsuku rcanɯ, sŋiɕɤr ʑo tu-ɕe-nɯ kɯnɤ, χsɯ-xpa jamar mɤɕtʂa kɤ-zɣɯt mɯ́j-kɯ-cha khi. nɯra tu-ti-nɯ pɯ-ŋu tɕe, tɕe nɯra kɯ-fse tu-ɕe-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, nɯra tɤ-ari-nɯ pɯ-tsu tɕe, ɬasa ci kɤ-ɕe /apɯra tɕe/ a-pɯ-kɯ-cha tɕe tɕe, /kɯɕɯ/ ɕɯ-kɤ-nɯʁɲɤlwa mɤ-kɯ-ra, tɕe nɯnɯ, nɤkinɯ, ʁɲɤlwa tɕe tɕe kɤ-scit kɯ-khɯ, nɯmaʁnɤ tɕe, nɯ-kɯ-si qhe tɕe mɤ-kɯ-nɤrʑaʁ tɕe li tu-kɯ-sci kɯ-sɤcha. nɯnɯra tu-nɯ-sɯpa-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, (110) ɬasa ntsɯ tu-ɕe-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu. tɕendɤre nɯ kɯ-fse ntsɯ tu-ɕe-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ, tu-kɯ-ɕe wuma ʑo pjɤ-dɤn. ri li kɤ-ɕe kɯ-cha nɯ, pjɤ-rkɯn ɕti matɕi, tsuku tɕe tu-ɕe-nɯ tɕe pjɯ-nɯɣi-nɯ ra pjɤ-cha-nɯ, tɕeri tsuku tɕe tu-ɕe-nɯ qhe tɕe, tʂu qhe ɲɯ-mtsɯr-nɯ, tu-ngo-nɯ kɯ-fse qhe pjɯ-si-nɯ. qhe kɤ-nɯɣi mɤ-kɯ-cha kɯnɤ pjɤ-tu. tɕendɤre nɯra kɯ-fse tɕe tɕe, kɯɕɯŋgɯ tɕe tɯrme ra khro mɯ-pjɤ-ɕqraʁ-nɯ ɕti qhe, tɕendɤre li tsuku, ɕnɤcat jamar ci pjɤ-tu-nɯ loβ ma, nɯra tɯtɯrca tɕe tu-kɤ-ɕe to-pa-nɯ qhe to-rɤkrɤz-nɯ. (150) tɕe tu-ɕe-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu ri, tɕendɤre tshɯrɟɯn ʑo /torts/ tu-ʑɣɤrtsi-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu. (200) tu-ʑɣɤrtsi-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu ma "ɯmɤ-ku-tshoz-i ma" nɯra matɕi iɕqha, (205) tu-ŋke-nɯ nɤ tu-ŋke-nɯ qhe nɯ-rkɯ ra mɤ-kɤ-nɤrɯra tu-ɕe-nɯ qhe, tsuku ɲɤ-jmɯ-jmɯt-nɯ qhe, mɯ-ɲɯ-tshoz-nɯ qhe, (205) nɯ-zda pjɯ-si-nɯ mɯ-pjɯ-nɯ-sɯχsɤl-nɯ pjɤ-ŋgrɤl. tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, nɤkinɯ, tɕe to-ɕe-nɯ tɕe, tɕendɤre, nɤkinɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. ci kɯ to-ti tɕe, hanɯni kɯ-ɕqraʁ nɯ kɯ "iʑora ɯmɤ-ku-tshoz-i ɣe, kɤsɯfse ku-tu-j ɯmɤ-ŋu?" nɯra to-ti. tɕendɤre ci nɯ kɯ "wo mɤ-ʁdɯɣ ma nɯnɯ ʁo aʑo tu-rtsi-a tɕe saχsɤl ɕti" to-ti. tɕe kɯ ci ko-ʑa tɕe ko-rtsi ri, nɤkinɯ, tɯ-rdoʁ mɯ-pjɤ-tshoz. ndi ci ɲɤ-ʑa qhe to-rtsi, tɯ-rdoʁ mɯ-pjɤ-tshoz. tɕendɤre "amaŋ nɯ tɯ-rdoʁ nɯ mɯ́j-tshoz-i tɕe, tɕhi to-fse kɯ matɕi, nɯ kɤ-tɕhaʁ kɯ-saχsɤl maŋe tɕe, nɯ tɕhi ɯ-skɤt ɲɯ-ŋu?" tu-omɯti-nɯ.(250) tɕendɤre pjɤ-rɯsɯso-nɯ ndɤre, nɯ kɯ-tso pjɤ-me. kɯ-maqhu tɕe, nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ hanɯni kɯ-ɕqraʁ ci pjɤ-tu. "tɕe mɤ-ʁdɯɣ /netɕ/ qhe, nɤki, ?? rɯndzɤtshi-j tɤkha tɕe, ji-khɯtsa ra kɤsɯfse kɯ ʑo nɯtɕu sɤʑirja-j tɕe, nɯnɯ ji-khɯtsa ci tú-wɣ-rtsi" to-ti. tɕe to-rtsi-nɯ ri, ci kɯ ko-ʑa, ci ndi ɲɤ-ʑa ri, kɯ-tɕhaʁ pjɤ-me. tɕe nɯ-khɯtsa nɯ pjɤ-tshoz ɕti tɕe, "wo mɯ-ɲɤ-tɕhaʁ-i maŋe, ji-khɯtsa ɲɯ-tshoz ɕti" to-ti. (320) tɕe nɯra kɯ-fse tu-fse-nɯ pjɤ-ŋu.
